杗字的基本解释

杗
máng
房屋的大梁：“夫大木为杗，细木为桷。”

杗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［máng］
［《廣韻》莫郎切，平唐，明。］
［《廣韻》武方切，平陽，微。］
屋的正梁。

杗字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杗； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页512第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】武方切【正韻】無方切，?音亡。【說文】杗，棟也。【爾雅·釋宮】杗廇謂之梁。　又【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?謨郞切，音茫。大梁也。【韓愈·進學解】大木爲杗。　又【韻會】眉甍切【正韻】眉庚切，?音盲。義同。

杗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
杗字的起名意思

房屋的大梁。

beam
Basic explanation of words
beam
máng
The beams of the house: "The big wood is a burp, and the fine wood is a burp."
beam
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [máng]
["Guangyun" Mo Langqie, Ping Tang, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" Wu Fangqie, Pingyang, Wei. ]
The main beam of the house.
beam
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杗; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 512 No. 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Wu Fangqie [Zheng Yun] There is no square cut, and the sound is dead. [Said the text] He, Dong Ye. 【Erya·Shigong】杗廇 is called Liang.　 [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Mo Yun cut, the sound is vast. The beam is also. 【Han Yu·Jinxuejie】Damu is 杗.　[Yunhui] Eyebrow cut [Zhengyun] Eyebrow cut, sound blind. The same meaning.
